item.title: Lower Cargo Compartment Fire Extinguisher System – Bottles (C & D) or (C, D, E & F) – Lower Cargo Compartment Distribution Networks – Both Networks Inoperative

numlitem.para: For four bottle systems, flight remains within 30 minutes of landing at a suitable airport, and
For six bottle systems, flight remains within 20 minutes of landing at a suitable airport.

note.para: UPS aircraft N570UP-577UP have four bottle systems.
UPS aircraft N578UP-579UP have six bottle systems.

numlitem.para: Flight remains within 30 minutes of a suitable airport (N570UP-N577UP).
Flight remains within 20 minutes of a suitable airport (N578UP-N579UP).

placard.para: Placard near discharge switch on fire control module located on the pilots overhead panel: "BOTTLE _____ INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
